Smart Toothbrush with built-in sensors: A toothbrush with sensors that can monitor the user's brushing habits and provide personalized feedback to improve their oral hygiene routine.
Toothbrush with a built-in microphone: A toothbrush that can play music or audiobooks to make brushing more enjoyable and relaxing.
Toothbrush with a built-in timer: A toothbrush that can the user to brush for the recommended two minutes, ensuring they cover all areas of their mouth.
Toothbrush with a built-in UV light: A toothbrush that can help detect cavities and other dental issues by illuminating the teeth and gums.
Toothbrush with a built-in LED display: A toothbrush that can display information such as brushing time, pressure, and battery life, making it easier for the user to track their oral hygiene routine.
